synopsis.text: Satan's cousin, Lucy, finds her world at a standstill after her band breaks up, leaving her with a string of unfulfilling days. However, a glimmer of hope appears when she encounters her cousin, Satan, and his bandmate, Ibaraki Douji. They extend an invitation for her to join their indie band, the 'Wicked Pistols'. Satan shares his ambitious dream of winning the MONSTERS ROCK competition and going major, but Lucy swiftly dismisses the idea. Despite her initial reluctance, Lucy's icy demeanor starts to melt after a pivotal moment. This special Golden Week episode of Monster Strike 2 promises a captivating journey of music and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
